about.title: Building the Future of Web Development
about.subtitle: We're making web development accessible to everyone through the power of AI

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At Kliv, we believe that everyone should have the power to create amazing web applications, regardless of their technical background. Our mission is to democratize web development by making it as simple as having a conversation.
mission.paragraph2: We're building the future where ideas can be transformed into fully functional web applications through natural language, removing the barriers that have traditionally separated creators from their visions.

accessibility.title: Accessibility First
accessibility.description: We believe technology should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical expertise or background.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We're constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI-assisted development.

empowerment.title: User Empowerment
empowerment.description: Our tools are designed to empower users to bring their ideas to life without limitations.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: We build for our community and with our community, listening to feedback and evolving together.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Kliv was born from the frustration of seeing great ideas never come to life because of technical barriers. Our founders experienced firsthand how the complexity of web development could prevent brilliant concepts from reaching the world.
story.paragraph2: We started with a simple question: What if building a web application could be as easy as describing what you want? This question led us to explore the intersection of artificial intelligence and web development.
story.paragraph3: Today, Kliv represents years of research, development, and refinement. We've created a platform that doesn't just generate codeâ€”it understands intent, learns from feedback, and helps users iterate on their ideas in real-time.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.paragraph1: Kliv is built on cutting-edge AI technology that understands natural language and translates it into production-ready code. Our platform leverages the latest advances in machine learning to provide an intuitive development experience.
technology.paragraph2: We use modern web technologies including React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to ensure that the applications built with Kliv are fast, scalable, and maintainable. Our integration with Supabase provides robust backend capabilities out of the box.
technology.paragraph3: Security and performance are at the core of everything we build. Every application created with Kliv follows best practices for web development, ensuring that your projects are not just functional, but also secure and optimized.
